page.title: 03 Arts and Crafts
page.content:
The Highland Aromatics soap factory has been converted from a Free Church to a soap factory.They also make perfume and perfume pillows ,sachets and talc.
The business started when the owner had to buy expensive soaps because she had sensitive skin, so she decided to start her own business in the Highlands.
They even have orders for the Royal family at Balmoral. But mostly the soap and perfume are sold to tourists who come and visit the factory.
The most westerly place catered for is Alaska. And it has been heard that the soap is being sold in Sydeny Opera House.
